Name: SPECIAL FORCE VR
About the game: Legendary FPS, SPECIAL FORCE finally launches on HTC VIVE! Enjoy your thrilling experience in virtual battle field with high end graphics on HTC VIVE. Game Features - Players become Mason, Delta Force agent, and fight against FTE (Force of Third Empire). - Eliminate enemies with machine gun, rocket launcher and other various weapons. - Lots of endless and complicated attacks from gigantic boss monster and other enemies. - With super gloves, players can grab the rocket and fire back at enemies. - Destroy gigantic boss monster by operating drone tactically.
